text: MHI provides comprehensive mental health support including therapy referrals, crisis support (call 988 or 1-800-MHI-HELP), educational resources, support groups, and online tools. For help, call 1-800-MHI-CARE or visit the-mhi.org/mental-health

You are not alone. Help is available right now.
MHI Heart Health Programs include free screenings, educational workshops, partner network with cardiologists, and prevention resources. Visit the-mhi.org/heart-health or call 1-800-MHI-CARE

Therapy options: CBT (cognitive behavioral therapy), DBT (dialectical behavior therapy), EMDR (trauma therapy), individual therapy, group therapy, and family therapy. Contact the-mhi.org/therapy or call 1-800-MHI-CARE
